sentences.english: The banks shall accept the fines and turn them over directly to the State Treasury.
sentences.chinese: 銀行應當收受罰款，並將罰款直接上繳國庫。

sentences.english: We have signed a blank cheque on the public purse.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經簽了一張國庫的空白支票。

sentences.english: It was no problem to put an end to the independent treasury.
sentences.chinese: 終止獨立國庫是沒有問題的。

sentences.english: And America needs China for a lot more than T-bonds.
sentences.chinese: 中國需要美國並不僅侷限於購買國庫券。

sentences.english: First, the district Guoku Chu construction of a booster pump station, on the water pressure.
sentences.chinese: 一是在區國庫處建一加壓泵站，對自來水加壓。

sentences.english: Bullet trains should be for those states who give maximum revenue to the exchequer.
sentences.chinese: 高鐵應該提供給那些對國庫貢獻最多稅收的邦。

sentences.english: All penalties collected shall be handed over to the National Treasury, and may not be withheld by any unit or individual.
sentences.chinese: 罰款一律上繳國庫，任何單位和個人不得截留。

sentences.english: Good governance produced more government revenues, which quadrupled over the last 8 years.
sentences.chinese: 善治使國庫日漸充實，政府收入八年來翻了兩番。

sentences.english: The confiscated illegal income shall be handed over to the State treasury according to law.
sentences.chinese: 沒收的違法所得依法上繳國庫。

sentences.english: And such fees shall be turned over to the State Treasury.
sentences.chinese: 收取的工本費和加註費上繳國庫。

sentences.english: Good governance produced more government revenues, which quadrupled over the last eight years.
sentences.chinese: 善治使國庫日漸充實，政府收入八年來翻了兩番。

sentences.english: We will deepen the reform to set up a centralized treasury payment system and a government procurement system.
sentences.chinese: 深化國庫集中收付和政府採購制度改革。

sentences.english: To administer, supervise and inspect the integrated payment by the Ministry from the fiscal treasury.
sentences.chinese: 負責農業部財政國庫集中支付管理和監督檢查工作。

sentences.english: All Notes pay interest twice a year, and expire at par value.
sentences.chinese: 所有中期國庫券的利息每年按票面金額支付兩次。

sentences.english: The interest rate of T-Bills is determined at each auction, depending on what bidders are willing to pay.
sentences.chinese: 短期國庫券的利率在每次拍賣時由投標人的出價決定。

sentences.english: The property confiscated by the State security organs shall, in any case, be turned in to the State Treasury.
sentences.chinese: 國家安全機關沒收的財物，一律上繳國庫。

definition: variant of 巨額|巨额[ju4 e2]
to raise a loan/to borrow money
to repay a debt in kind or by labor
Fabi, first currency issued by the 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] in 1935, in use until 1948
